1.text: Pour hydrogen peroxide, vinegar, lemon juice, or denture cleaner into a bowl.

2.text: Soak your nails for up to 10 minutes to bleach them.

3.text: Rinse your nails off in warm water to remove the solution.

4.text: Soak your nails 2-3 times per week until they’re white.

5.text: Apply a whitening toothpaste to your nails and let it sit for 10 minutes.

6.text: Make a baking soda paste and let it sit on your nails for 30 minutes.

7.text: Scrub a baking soda-lemon juice paste onto your nails and wait 10 minutes.

8.text: Wipe your nails down with nail polish remover for polish stains.

9.text: Color your tips white with a whitening nail pencil for a quick fix.

10.text: Use a base coat when painting your nails to prevent yellowing.

11.text: Choose lighter colors of nail polish instead of darker shades.
